properties.name: maxSimultaneousStreams
properties.description: Maximum number of simultaneous screen recording streams

properties.name: maxConfigurableScreenRecordingStreams
properties.description: Upper limit that maxSimultaneousStreams can be configured

properties.name: regionalRecordingStorageEnabled
properties.description: Store call recordings in the region where they are intended to be recorded, otherwise in the organization's home region

properties.name: recordingPlaybackUrlTtl
properties.description: The duration in minutes for which the generated URL for recording playback remains valid.The default duration is set to 60 minutes, with a minimum allowable duration of 2 minutes and a maximum of 60 minutes.

properties.name: recordingBatchDownloadUrlTtl
properties.description: The duration in minutes for which the generated URL for recording batch download remains valid.The default duration is set to 60 minutes, with a minimum allowable duration of 2 minutes and a maximum of 60 minutes.
